conversations.english: Jane! What an enchanting skirt you have on!
conversations.reply_english: Thank you! Guess how much it costs.

title: 这些商品现在特价销售

conversations.english: Have you got any cheaper ones?
conversations.reply_english: Here are some.They're on special sale these days.

title: 或许我们可以为你破例 Make an exception

conversations.english: I was wondering whether you could ship the tennis racket overseas to Taiwan.
conversations.chinese: 我想知道你是否可以把网球拍寄到台湾。
conversations.reply_english: I'm sorry we don't ship overseas. It's too much trouble.
conversations.reply_chinese: 很抱歉我们不寄到海外。太麻烦了。

conversations.english: Hello. Do you like this jewelry? I made most of these items myself.
conversations.chinese: 哈啰。你喜欢这个首饰吗﹖这些东西大多是我自己做的。
conversations.reply_english: You really have talent. How did you learn to do this?
conversations.reply_chinese: 妳真是有天份。你怎么学会做首饰的﹖

title: 我想买个书架 I’m looking for a bookcase

conversations.english: Why are you reading the classifieds? What do you need?
conversations.chinese: 你为什么在看这些分类广告？你需要买什么？
conversations.reply_english: I’m looking for a bookcase, but I don’t want to buy a new one.
conversations.reply_chinese: 我想找个书架，但是我不想要一个新的。

title: 那个花瓶我觉得太贵了

conversations.english: May I have a look at that vase, please?
conversations.chinese: 我可以看一下那个花瓶吗？
conversations.reply_english: Of course. It's the best one I have here—and it's only 300 yuan.
conversations.reply_chinese: 当然。这是我最好的存货--只要三百元。

title: 让我们折中一下八五折吧

conversations.english: This blouse is a special offer today. You can have it at 10% off the regular price.
conversations.chinese: 这件衬衫是今天的特别推荐商品，价钱可以打九折。
conversations.reply_english: It's nice, but still too expensive. Can you give me a 20% discount?
conversations.reply_chinese: 是不错。但还是太贵了。能打八折吗？

title: 这已经是价格的最底限了 Final offer

conversations.english: How much for these autographed Elvis records?
conversations.chinese: 这些猫王的签名唱片多少钱﹖
conversations.reply_english: Thirty bucks a record. Or five for one hundred and twenty bucks.
conversations.reply_chinese: 一张三十元。或是五张一百二十元。

title: 你只能降这么点儿价钱吗

conversations.english: I found it at a garage sale once.
conversations.chinese: 有一次我在一个车库拍卖找到的.
conversations.reply_english: What a find! So, how much does it cost?
conversations.reply_chinese: 真是挖到宝了！那你要卖多少﹖

title: 再便宜点儿我就买了 Negotiating a Price

conversations.english: I am really interested in buying this television.
conversations.chinese: 我非常想买这台电视机。

conversations.reply_english: We never overcharge. It is a fair price to pay.
conversations.reply_chinese: 我们从来不乱出价。这是公道价钱。
